activategateway.name: ActivateGateway
activategateway.description: Grants permission to activate the gateway you previously deployed on your host

addcache.name: AddCache
addcache.description: Grants permission to configure one or more gateway local disks as cache for a cached-volume gateway

addtagstoresource.name: AddTagsToResource
addtagstoresource.description: Grants permission to add one or more tags to the specified resource

adduploadbuffer.name: AddUploadBuffer
adduploadbuffer.description: Grants permission to configure one or more gateway local disks as upload buffer for a specified gateway

addworkingstorage.name: AddWorkingStorage
addworkingstorage.description: Grants permission to configure one or more gateway local disks as working storage for a gateway

assigntapepool.name: AssignTapePool
assigntapepool.description: Grants permission to move a tape to the target pool specified

associatefilesystem.name: AssociateFileSystem
associatefilesystem.description: Grants permission to associate an Amazon FSx file system with the Amazon FSx file gateway

attachvolume.name: AttachVolume
attachvolume.description: Grants permission to connect a volume to an iSCSI connection and then attaches the volume to the specified gateway

bypassgovernanceretention.name: BypassGovernanceRetention
bypassgovernanceretention.description: Grants permission to allow the governance retention lock on a pool to be bypassed

cancelarchival.name: CancelArchival
cancelarchival.description: Grants permission to cancel archiving of a virtual tape to the virtual tape shelf (VTS) after the archiving process is initiated

cancelretrieval.name: CancelRetrieval
cancelretrieval.description: Grants permission to cancel retrieval of a virtual tape from the virtual tape shelf (VTS) to a gateway after the retrieval process is initiated

createcachediscsivolume.name: CreateCachediSCSIVolume
createcachediscsivolume.description: Grants permission to create a cached volume on a specified cached gateway. This operation is supported only for the gateway-cached volume architecture

createnfsfileshare.name: CreateNFSFileShare
createnfsfileshare.description: Grants permission to create a NFS file share on an existing file gateway

createsmbfileshare.name: CreateSMBFileShare
createsmbfileshare.description: Grants permission to create a SMB file share on an existing file gateway

createsnapshot.name: CreateSnapshot
createsnapshot.description: Grants permission to initiate a snapshot of a volume

createsnapshotfromvolumerecoverypoint.name: CreateSnapshotFromVolumeRecoveryPoint
createsnapshotfromvolumerecoverypoint.description: Grants permission to initiate a snapshot of a gateway from a volume recovery point

createstorediscsivolume.name: CreateStorediSCSIVolume
createstorediscsivolume.description: Grants permission to create a volume on a specified gateway

createtapepool.name: CreateTapePool
createtapepool.description: Grants permission to create a tape pool

createtapewithbarcode.name: CreateTapeWithBarcode
createtapewithbarcode.description: Grants permission to create a virtual tape by using your own barcode

createtapes.name: CreateTapes
createtapes.description: Grants permission to create one or more virtual tapes. You write data to the virtual tapes and then archive the tapes

deleteautomatictapecreationpolicy.name: DeleteAutomaticTapeCreationPolicy
deleteautomatictapecreationpolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the automatic tape creation policy configured on a gateway-VTL

deletebandwidthratelimit.name: DeleteBandwidthRateLimit
deletebandwidthratelimit.description: Grants permission to delete the bandwidth rate limits of a gateway

deletechapcredentials.name: DeleteChapCredentials
deletechapcredentials.description: Grants permission to delete Challenge-Handshake Authentication Protocol (CHAP) credentials for a specified iSCSI target and initiator pair

deletefileshare.name: DeleteFileShare
deletefileshare.description: Grants permission to delete a file share from a file gateway

deletegateway.name: DeleteGateway
deletegateway.description: Grants permission to delete a gateway

deletesnapshotschedule.name: DeleteSnapshotSchedule
deletesnapshotschedule.description: Grants permission to delete a snapshot of a volume

deletetape.name: DeleteTape
deletetape.description: Grants permission to delete the specified virtual tape

deletetapearchive.name: DeleteTapeArchive
deletetapearchive.description: Grants permission to delete the specified virtual tape from the virtual tape shelf (VTS)

deletetapepool.name: DeleteTapePool
deletetapepool.description: Grants permission to delete the specified tape pool

deletevolume.name: DeleteVolume
deletevolume.description: Grants permission to delete the specified gateway volume that you previously created using the CreateCachediSCSIVolume or CreateStorediSCSIVolume API

describeavailabilitymonitortest.name: DescribeAvailabilityMonitorTest
describeavailabilitymonitortest.description: Grants permission to get the information about the most recent high availability monitoring test that was performed on the gateway

describebandwidthratelimit.name: DescribeBandwidthRateLimit
describebandwidthratelimit.description: Grants permission to get the bandwidth rate limits of a gateway

describebandwidthratelimitschedule.name: DescribeBandwidthRateLimitSchedule
describebandwidthratelimitschedule.description: Grants permission to get the bandwidth rate limit schedule of a gateway

describecache.name: DescribeCache
describecache.description: Grants permission to get information about the cache of a gateway. This operation is supported only for the gateway-cached volume architecture

describecachediscsivolumes.name: DescribeCachediSCSIVolumes
describecachediscsivolumes.description: Grants permission to get a description of the gateway volumes specified in the request. This operation is supported only for the gateway-cached volume architecture

describechapcredentials.name: DescribeChapCredentials
describechapcredentials.description: Grants permission to get an array of Challenge-Handshake Authentication Protocol (CHAP) credentials information for a specified iSCSI target, one for each target-initiator pair

describefilesystemassociations.name: DescribeFileSystemAssociations
describefilesystemassociations.description: Grants permission to get a description for one or more file system associations

describegatewayinformation.name: DescribeGatewayInformation
describegatewayinformation.description: Grants permission to get metadata about a gateway such as its name, network interfaces, configured time zone, and the state (whether the gateway is running or not)

describemaintenancestarttime.name: DescribeMaintenanceStartTime
describemaintenancestarttime.description: Grants permission to get your gateway's weekly maintenance start time including the day and time of the week

describenfsfileshares.name: DescribeNFSFileShares
describenfsfileshares.description: Grants permission to get a description for one or more file shares from a file gateway

describesmbfileshares.name: DescribeSMBFileShares
describesmbfileshares.description: Grants permission to get a description for one or more file shares from a file gateway

describesmbsettings.name: DescribeSMBSettings
describesmbsettings.description: Grants permission to get a description of a Server Message Block (SMB) file share settings from a file gateway

describesnapshotschedule.name: DescribeSnapshotSchedule
describesnapshotschedule.description: Grants permission to describe the snapshot schedule for the specified gateway volume

describestorediscsivolumes.name: DescribeStorediSCSIVolumes
describestorediscsivolumes.description: Grants permission to get the description of the gateway volumes specified in the request

describetapearchives.name: DescribeTapeArchives
describetapearchives.description: Grants permission to get a description of specified virtual tapes in the virtual tape shelf (VTS)

describetaperecoverypoints.name: DescribeTapeRecoveryPoints
describetaperecoverypoints.description: Grants permission to get a list of virtual tape recovery points that are available for the specified gateway-VTL

describetapes.name: DescribeTapes
describetapes.description: Grants permission to get a description of the specified Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of virtual tapes

describeuploadbuffer.name: DescribeUploadBuffer
describeuploadbuffer.description: Grants permission to get information about the upload buffer of a gateway

describevtldevices.name: DescribeVTLDevices
describevtldevices.description: Grants permission to get a description of virtual tape library (VTL) devices for the specified gateway

describeworkingstorage.name: DescribeWorkingStorage
describeworkingstorage.description: Grants permission to get information about the working storage of a gateway

detachvolume.name: DetachVolume
detachvolume.description: Grants permission to disconnect a volume from an iSCSI connection and then detaches the volume from the specified gateway

disablegateway.name: DisableGateway
disablegateway.description: Grants permission to disable a gateway when the gateway is no longer functioning

disassociatefilesystem.name: DisassociateFileSystem
disassociatefilesystem.description: Grants permission to disassociate an Amazon FSx file system from an Amazon FSx file gateway

joindomain.name: JoinDomain
joindomain.description: Grants permission to enable you to join an Active Directory Domain

listautomatictapecreationpolicies.name: ListAutomaticTapeCreationPolicies
listautomatictapecreationpolicies.description: Grants permission to list the automatic tape creation policies configured on the specified gateway-VTL or all gateway-VTLs owned by your AWS account

listfileshares.name: ListFileShares
listfileshares.description: Grants permission to get a list of the file shares for a specific file gateway, or the list of file shares owned by your AWS account

listfilesystemassociations.name: ListFileSystemAssociations
listfilesystemassociations.description: Grants permission to get a list of the file system associations for the specified gateway

listgateways.name: ListGateways
listgateways.description: Grants permission to list gateways owned by an AWS account in a region specified in the request. The returned list is ordered by gateway Amazon Resource Name (ARN)

listlocaldisks.name: ListLocalDisks
listlocaldisks.description: Grants permission to get a list of the gateway's local disks

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to get the tags that have been added to the specified resource

listtapepools.name: ListTapePools
listtapepools.description: Grants permission to list tape pools owned by your AWS account

listtapes.name: ListTapes
listtapes.description: Grants permission to list virtual tapes in your virtual tape library (VTL) and your virtual tape shelf (VTS)

listvolumeinitiators.name: ListVolumeInitiators
listvolumeinitiators.description: Grants permission to list iSCSI initiators that are connected to a volume

listvolumerecoverypoints.name: ListVolumeRecoveryPoints
listvolumerecoverypoints.description: Grants permission to list the recovery points for a specified gateway

listvolumes.name: ListVolumes
listvolumes.description: Grants permission to list the iSCSI stored volumes of a gateway

notifywhenuploaded.name: NotifyWhenUploaded
notifywhenuploaded.description: Grants permission to send you a notification through CloudWatch Events when all files written to your NFS file share have been uploaded to Amazon S3

refreshcache.name: RefreshCache
refreshcache.description: Grants permission to refresh the cache for the specified file share

removetagsfromresource.name: RemoveTagsFromResource
removetagsfromresource.description: Grants permission to remove one or more tags from the specified resource

resetcache.name: ResetCache
resetcache.description: Grants permission to reset all cache disks that have encountered a error and makes the disks available for reconfiguration as cache storage

retrievetapearchive.name: RetrieveTapeArchive
retrievetapearchive.description: Grants permission to retrieve an archived virtual tape from the virtual tape shelf (VTS) to a gateway-VTL

retrievetaperecoverypoint.name: RetrieveTapeRecoveryPoint
retrievetaperecoverypoint.description: Grants permission to retrieve the recovery point for the specified virtual tape

setlocalconsolepassword.name: SetLocalConsolePassword
setlocalconsolepassword.description: Grants permission to set the password for your VM local console

setsmbguestpassword.name: SetSMBGuestPassword
setsmbguestpassword.description: Grants permission to set the password for SMB Guest user

shutdowngateway.name: ShutdownGateway
shutdowngateway.description: Grants permission to shut down a gateway

startavailabilitymonitortest.name: StartAvailabilityMonitorTest
startavailabilitymonitortest.description: Grants permission to start a test that verifies that the specified gateway is configured for High Availability monitoring in your host environment

startgateway.name: StartGateway
startgateway.description: Grants permission to start a gateway that you previously shut down

updateautomatictapecreationpolicy.name: UpdateAutomaticTapeCreationPolicy
updateautomatictapecreationpolicy.description: Grants permission to update the automatic tape creation policy configured on a gateway-VTL

updatebandwidthratelimit.name: UpdateBandwidthRateLimit
updatebandwidthratelimit.description: Grants permission to update the bandwidth rate limits of a gateway

updatebandwidthratelimitschedule.name: UpdateBandwidthRateLimitSchedule
updatebandwidthratelimitschedule.description: Grants permission to update the bandwidth rate limit schedule of a gateway

updatechapcredentials.name: UpdateChapCredentials
updatechapcredentials.description: Grants permission to update the Challenge-Handshake Authentication Protocol (CHAP) credentials for a specified iSCSI target

updatefilesystemassociation.name: UpdateFileSystemAssociation
updatefilesystemassociation.description: Grants permission to update a file system association

updategatewayinformation.name: UpdateGatewayInformation
updategatewayinformation.description: Grants permission to update a gateway's metadata, which includes the gateway's name and time zone

updategatewaysoftwarenow.name: UpdateGatewaySoftwareNow
updategatewaysoftwarenow.description: Grants permission to update the gateway virtual machine (VM) software

updatemaintenancestarttime.name: UpdateMaintenanceStartTime
updatemaintenancestarttime.description: Grants permission to update a gateway's weekly maintenance start time information, including day and time of the week. The maintenance time is the time in your gateway's time zone

updatenfsfileshare.name: UpdateNFSFileShare
updatenfsfileshare.description: Grants permission to update a NFS file share

updatesmbfileshare.name: UpdateSMBFileShare
updatesmbfileshare.description: Grants permission to update a SMB file share

updatesmbfilesharevisibility.name: UpdateSMBFileShareVisibility
updatesmbfilesharevisibility.description: Grants permission to update whether the shares on a gateway are visible in a net view or browse list

updatesmblocalgroups.name: UpdateSMBLocalGroups
updatesmblocalgroups.description: Grants permission to update the list of Active Directory users and groups that have special permissions for SMB file shares on the gateway

updatesmbsecuritystrategy.name: UpdateSMBSecurityStrategy
updatesmbsecuritystrategy.description: Grants permission to update the SMB security strategy on a file gateway

updatesnapshotschedule.name: UpdateSnapshotSchedule
updatesnapshotschedule.description: Grants permission to update a snapshot schedule configured for a gateway volume

updatevtldevicetype.name: UpdateVTLDeviceType
updatevtldevicetype.description: Grants permission to update the type of medium changer in a gateway-VTL
